website_summaries.verdict: A versatile, filter-free soy milk maker with a high-speed motor that is equally adept at making hot or cold recipes.
pros: JOYOUNG's food-grade stainless steel Soy Milk Maker has a non-slip bottom and features time and temperature controls so you can make everything from soy milk to porridge
The easy operation allows you to preheat, grind, and cook at the touch of a single button
cons: Since there is no filtering, without straining, this machine produces soy milk of a grittier consistency than you may be used to

customer_reviews.title: Product does not work at all
customer_reviews.text: I put some black beans and water into the pot. It stopped after a few minutes running. It never came back to work again. Worse product I ever bought. It doesn't work. It kept showing "E2" code. Error!!!!
customer_reviews.author: PP

customer_reviews.title: The motor doesn't work anymore
customer_reviews.text: I did like the soy maker but it stopped working today. The motor doesn't work anymore. I just bought it last month. Could you help return or replace it?
customer_reviews.author: yujuan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. My parentes has one and I figured ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. My parentes has one and I figured should have one too. really like it, it is smooth and very easy to clean. suggest to buy~
customer_reviews.author: cchenhou

customer_reviews.title: Machine stuck at frost time use!
customer_reviews.text: Why the quality of this product can’t give us more confidence?

customer_reviews.title: The buttons does not work (blink or beep) on pressed ...
customer_reviews.text: The buttons does not work (blink or beep) on pressed, got to return this an get another one that coast half, but worked so well
customer_reviews.author: Zhan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, Easy to clean up!!!!  YAAAY a product that fully lives up to your expectations!
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased an additional 4 units to give as gifts as this is such a well designed and excellent machine, we use several times weekly for fresh corn milk, soy milk, peanut milk (mmm,so tasty). Truly a fantastic machine!! Will definitely buy more in future for friends/family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very good. soy milk come out is so fine and ...
customer_reviews.text: very good . soy milk come out is so fine and smell so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Zheng

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchase! My mom used to have a older version from the same company. I decided to give this new one a try. It has been working great after several months.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and works fine for me. However, it is not good to make juice.
customer_reviews.author: AwesomeQQ

customer_reviews.title: If you can accept noise you will love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but it makes noise when it is working .
customer_reviews.author: ian1157

customer_reviews.title: The grind is really fine and even.
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised. It grinds really fine. I used a 80 micron mesh and the solids just go right through. The controls are not very intuitive. While the grind is very fine, it's still quite gritty. The solids won't go away just because they're pulverized.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie L. Fok

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much. It makes all juice I want.
customer_reviews.author: Kwok Ng

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t be that good after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: The blender knife can get dull very fast, just after 2 months (used once/week), the particle get much larger.
customer_reviews.author: david wan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! I use it almost every day. It is just a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: PY

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good product! Super easy to use, and easy to clean compare to old model. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I really like it, used it everyday. Would like more recipe.
customer_reviews.author: findway

customer_reviews.title: Very good kitchen machine to get breakfast ready easily
customer_reviews.text: Very good kitchen machine to get breakfast ready easily. Used it for oatmeal making with smooth taste. You can add nuts, beans, or raisin to oatmeal to increase nutrition. It is recommended for aged people. Cleaning of it after use is not so easy and you have to hold the top part and brush it. Programming is good for use, but I prefer to get longer time setting (current one has only 8 hours).
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Durable so far
customer_reviews.text: My wife is Chinese and she really wanted an easy way to make soy milk at home. We saw this product and bought it. It is well made, maybe a little loud but not too bad, and it sure makes a good cup of soy milk without presoaking the beans! She also makes porridge in it. It seems very well made, heavy, and appears to be durable. We have been using it at least 5 times a week for a number of months now and there have been no problems at all. We just make sure to clean it straight away and we carefully follow the instructions although they were not in English so lucky she could read them.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Marco

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and clean!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this machine last week. I really love this product and use it every single day to make different breakfast for my family. So far everyone in my family love it. It is easy to clean and use. I owned one Joyoung Soy Milk Maker since 2002 and use it for 16 years. The Quality for that one was excellent. I hope this new generation will perform the same as the old generation!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Wei

customer_reviews.title: Just set the timer and wake up to fresh, warm soy milk!
customer_reviews.text: It took a couple tries to figure out the timer function, but now we love the machine. We started with soymilk, but my new favorite is purple potato and soy drink (like a hot thick smoothy.)
customer_reviews.author: luket

customer_reviews.title: Huarenstore- how to return product in USA?
customer_reviews.text: It works well for 3 months in 2018 for soymilk, then it stopped working. How do I contact Huarenstore of USA for return and what is the return policy? I bought via Amazon.com
customer_reviews.author: litezen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine w/better controls than previous model but for the pricy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent machine. The company should invest in proper English translation and a good recipe book. Not a great improvement over the previous (much cheaper) model and in fact a little more noisy and clumsy but then again, comparing excellent with good. This virtually excludes the need to use a strainer. It also makes soups. I chose this model because it had a button for nut milk. The controls did improve but the machine itself is not necessarily better then the previous model.
customer_reviews.author: KHan

customer_reviews.title: silky smooth soy milk
customer_reviews.text: This soy milk maker is amazing! After ordering 3 other different soy milk makers in the past, this one is by far the best. It blends the soy milk very smoothly, leaving no particles at the bottom/floating around.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My wife like this one very much. And we use it to make soy-milk every week. Also tried to make some soups and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Foresterxt01

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed with this appliance!  So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I’ve been using it all the time. Super easy to use and clean. I can make all sorts of healthy foods now.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it so much. We enjoy soy milk everyday
customer_reviews.author: Dan Chen

customer_reviews.title: Breakdown after two and half years
customer_reviews.text: We used and cleaned it carefully. And we didn't use it every day. It broke down about a month ago. Searched customer service online and the only number I could find is a number on HuarenStore's website. Called and left a message but never heard back from them. You wouldn't be able to fix it if it breaks down. Think twice before you place your order.
customer_reviews.author: dorachenjie

customer_reviews.title: Love this product! Received as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic machine for making fresh, creamy soymilk in less than 30 minutes. Received this as a gift and was skeptical at first, but honestly it is so simple and easy - you can make hot soymilk from beans without needing to presoak them, and in about thirty minutes you’ll have piping hot soymilk ready to drink! The recipe book shows options to combine other kinds of nut (peanut or walnut) to make different variations of soymilk, and I haven’t even begun to explore the additional options of making smoothies, soup, baby food puree, etc. A fantastic product, lightweight to clean and store as well.
customer_reviews.author: smats

product_meta.title: Joyoung Soy Milk Maker New Model DJ13U-D988SG(Updated from DJ13M-D988SG) With Delay Timer, No Filter
product_meta.description:
Product information
Product model:DJ13U-D988SG
Capacity: 900-1300ml
Input voltage: 120 V-60 Hz 
Rated power: 1200 W
Motor power: 300 W
Motor speed: 20000 r/min
Suitable: 2-4 persons
Product size: 230x180x310(mm) 
Net weight: 2.6 KG
Functions: Grains, wet/dry beans,baby porridge,tofu pudding,fruit tea,cooked material,soup,juice,pudding,stir,warm function,nuts drink and time & temperature presets
Input voltage: 120V-60Hz


Package:

1*Joyoung DJ13U-D988SG soy milk maker
1*Measuring cup
1*Cleaning cloth
1*Brush
1*AC power cord
1*Chinese & English user manual
Attention⚠-You may care:
Does it make lond sound? 
Yes. When it grinder, it make loud sound.
You could schedule the proper time to use it to avoid disturbing your daily life ,since it need to grind the beans with a high speed, it naturally make loud sound and we will improve that gradually.

Why it just make sound but don't grind?
Please kindly wait for 3 minutes.
Actually when you could hear the sound, it is grinding.
When you hear no sound, it is going the other steps.
The soy milk maker needs 5 step to produce the soy milk.
And there is a ciracle, so you will hear the sound intermittently.

It shows “E2”on the control panel and stop working.Why?
Usually, when the machine was over-temp, the machine will stop working out of safe protection.
Please don't add hot or warm water or juice into it.
And when it shows “E2”, put the beans out to make it cool down and try it again.

The soy milk is not proper for kids less than years old, if necessary, please check if there is little bean dregs or shell.
feature_bullets: More suitable for Chinese family. Designed for traditional Chinese meals. Functioned for Grains, dry/soaked beans, Rice paste, Tofu pudding, Fruit tea, Nut milk etc.
Along with Chinese & English panel, user manual and Chinese only Recipe. Back with 1 year warranty in United States.
No filter is needed; by largely grinding the soybeans with the high speed motor of 20000r/minute, while it does not mean no residue.
With warm function, cooled drinks can be easily be warm again. You have no worry of wasting. It will be your convenient time for warm or hot, early or late soymilk.
900~1300ML Capacity is suitable for 2-4 People; Good choice for a family; Input Voltage: 120V (D988SG is Designed for US Market, It can be used directly in United States)
